## Davinci Resolve

### Use Playhead as A Cutting Tool

Youtube Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yh77878QDVE
His playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLL6tMzF36ox2c--SNKiifuP8kEFh80wPu

CMD + B  -> "Blade"
CMD + SHIFT + `[` or `]`  to cut to location 

### Talking Head Circle Thingy

Here is a [circular camera filter](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lqh00nfr-UU) with OBS, which might be easier than DVR.

You can crop [like this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YLbo2OTTF6w)


### Pause

You can add pause recording as a hotkey in OBS
